meanings.definition: A person or thing that identifies.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to write their identifiers on the test papers.
meanings.sent2: The employee badges serve as identifiers to access the restricted area.
meanings.sent3: The identifiers at the zoo were the colorful name tags worn by the animals.
meanings.sent4: In the game of hide and seek, the flashlight became the ultimate identifier in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The unique identifiers on the keys made it easy to distinguish which one opened the door.

meanings.definition: A code or symbol used to represent a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The barcode on the product is an identifier for its price at the store.
meanings.sent2: The student ID number is an important identifier for accessing online resources.
meanings.sent3: The secret handshake between the friends became their special identifier in the group.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse served as a guiding identifier for ships in the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The unique identifier on the map helped the explorers locate the hidden treasure.
